questions.question: 1. Which is a classical example of codominance ?
2. Which of the following statements is true?

answers.a: Specific ABO blood types are known to be linked with increased or decreased susceptibility to particular diseases.
answers.b: Antibodies to alien antigens in ABO group may be present in one's body prior to the first contact with blood of a different ABO type.
answers.c: When our blood comes in contact with blood of a different type, our bodies can develop long-term immunity to the alien blood type.

questions.question: 3. People of blood group Ab can donate blood to _________.
4. People of blood group O can receive blood from _______.
